item.title: SeamlessM4T语音翻译微调之路
item.description: TL;DR 训练脚本及推理WebUI 1. 环境安装git clone https://github.com/facebookresearch/seamless_communication cd seamless_communication pip install . 2. 数据处理2.1 下载google/fleurs语料cd /media/ssd/ GIT_LFS_SKIP_SMUDGE=1 git clone https://hf-mirror.com/google/fleurs cd fleurs # pull 英文语料 git lfs
